scripts.copy-schemas: for d in src/api/*/; do name=$(basename "$d"); if [ -d "src/api/$name/content-types" ]; then mkdir -p "dist/src/api/$name/content-types"; cp -r "src/api/$name/content-types/"* "dist/src/api/$name/content-types/"; fi; done
scripts.build: npx strapi build && npm run copy-schemas
scripts.build-backend: npx tsc --project tsconfig.json && npm run copy-schemas
scripts.dev: npm run copy-schemas && npx strapi develop
scripts.develop: npm run copy-schemas && npx strapi develop
scripts.start: npm run copy-schemas && npx strapi start
